column4: qụóniam aŭdivìsti vèrba oris mei. In conspèctu anģelórum psallem tìbi. ^ I will praise thee
column7: for thou hast heard the words of my mouth. I will sing praise to thee in the sight of the angels.

column3: super misericórdia tua et veritáte tua~; qụóniam magnificavìsti super omne
column4: nomen sanctum tuum. ^ I will worship towards thy holy temple
column5: and I will give glory to thy name
column6: for thy mercy and for thy truth~; for thou hast magnified thy holy name above all.

column2: exáŭdi me~; multiplicábis in ánima mea virtútem. ^ In what day soever I shall call upon thee
column3: hear me~; thou shalt multiply strength in my soul.

column1: 4 ^ Confiteántur tìbi Dòmine òmnes reģes terraĕ
column2: qụia aŭdivérunt òmnia vèrba oris tui. ^ May all the kings of the earth give glory to thee
column3: for they have heard all the words of thy mouth.

column2: qụóniam magna est glória Dòmini~; ^ And let them sing in the ways of the Lord
column3: for great is the glory of the Lord~;
et alta a longe cognóscit. ^ for the Lord is high
column4: and looketh on the low things
column5: and the high things he knoweth afar off.

column2: vivificábis me~; super iram inimicórum meórum extendìsti manum tuam
column3: et salvum me fecit dèxtera tua. ^ If I shall walk in the midst of tribulation
column4: thou wilt quicken me~; thou hast stretched forth thy hand against the wrath of my enemies
column5: and thy right hand hath saved me.

column2: misericórdia tua in sáĕculum~; ópera mánuum tuárum ne despìcias. ^ The Lord will repay for me. O Lord
column3: thy mercy endureth for ever~; despise not the works of thy hands.
